structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

text.section: Any college that violates the provisions of KRS 164.947(3) shall be fined not less than one hundred dollars ($100).
Each day that a college violates the provisions of KRS 164.947(3) shall be deemed a separate offense.

law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 519, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990.
